Text: RE whats upmark this is very surreal right now i am doing alot of dammage control in rac as you can imagine it is an amazing learning experience but it has been very stressful erica is going to be done with enron by the end of december and then probably move back to dc she is totally fine with this now expecially given the current environment at enron i am sure that andy is happy in denver it is a great place to live im doing ok im really looking forward to coming home for tday and hangin with the fam how are you doing at enron Original Message From McConnell Mark Sent October To Cini Pat Subject whats up Pat Howdy What is going on I heard from Erica that she may have some decisions to make soon Are you going through the same thing Im interested to know I heard from Andy Maus last week He is doing some contract work for Enron He and his family are enjoying Denver Please call or email me I hope all is well Mark Mark McConnell Transwestern Pipeline Company office cell fax
